Hey All -

At the end of 2025, BDL made the difficult position to not do business in 2026. I had the opportunity to run the education team at an AI company, and decided it was the right move for me.

What does that mean? I still have the course I built and I am more than happy to share it with you, though I would not be able to deliver due to my new commitment.

Let me know what you think, and how you'd like to move forward. I will say, Leslie, my new company is always looking for new partners üòä

Sarah Nell-Rodriguez
Chief Learning Officer

tasks.name: [OPPTY] CANTO HR Conference - Speaking Invitation Feb 4-5
tasks.description:
[01/28/2026 00:35] üì• Task created

Andrea Lewis-Francis (CANTO) - Invitation to present at HR Conference, Hyatt Regency. Jan 14, 2026.
[01/28/2026 00:42] üìß ORIGINAL EMAIL:
FROM: Andrea Lewis-Francis <alewis@canto.org>
SUBJECT: Invitation to present- CANTO HR Conference Feb 4-5 2026 Hyatt Regency
DATE: 01/14/2026

BODY:
Dear Leslie,
Happy New Year! I hope you have been doing well.

On behalf of the Secretary General of CANTO, Mrs. Teresa Wankin, I am pleased to invite you to serve as a presenter at the CANTO 2026 Human Resource Leadership Conference, to be held in Trinidad and Tobago from February 4-5, 2026.

We would be delighted for you to present on the topic:
'AI and the Future of HR Leadership'
Proposed Date: Wednesday, February 4th, 2026
Proposed Time: 11:15 a.m.

This session is intended to explore how artificial intelligence is reshaping human resource leadership, including its impact on talent acquisition, workforce analytics, learning and development, and strategic decision-making.

We would be honoured if you would consider this invitation.

Best regards,
Andrea Lewis-Francis
Business Support Officer, CANTO
Office: 1 (868) 622-3770 ext. 2230

tasks.name: [OPPTY] Cook Islands Government - AI Services Implementation
tasks.description:
[01/28/2026 00:35] üì• Task created

Myra Patai (myra.patai@cookislands.gov.ck) - IMPLEMENTATION OF AI SERVICES. Jan 15, 2026. GOVERNMENT OPPORTUNITY - follow up!
[01/28/2026 00:42] üìß ORIGINAL EMAIL:
FROM: Myra Patai <myra.patai@cookislands.gov.ck>
SUBJECT: IMPLEMENTATION OF AI SERVICES
DATE: 01/15/2026

BODY:
Kia orana Leslie,

I understand you were recently in the Cook Islands, and I received your contact details from a colleague at Vodafone Cook Islands.

I'm reaching out to see whether you were able to connect with our ICT Support Team based at the Office of the Prime Minister (OPM), as they manage and support the Government's ICT network?

Yesterday, my Office participated in a foundational 'AI workshop' facilitated by Tayla Beddoes of Pacific Group AI, where we were introduced to several tools aimed at improving efficiencies, including Fireflies AI, Chat GPT, Claude, Rube, MS Power Automate, Canva and Wisps flow.

My Team is small (<15 staff) and they are now seeking approval from me to ask OPM to install some of these applications on our work devices.

Before progressing, I'm interested in understanding the services your organization offers and the associated fees (including for a small Office like mine).

This email is purely exploratory; I am not committing Government to any engagement at this stage.

Meitaki nui.

Myra Patai
Chief Executive Officer
Office of the Public Service Commissioner
Ararua, Rarotonga, Cook Islands

All pages functional. Build succeeds.
[01/28/2026 00:01] 12:00 AM - Midnight proactive work: Committed analytics/settings/teams pages to GitHub. Spawned sub-agent (ai-align-ui) to build landing page, auth UI, and initiatives page. Utilization at 15% - spawning parallel agents to increase.

HIRA social posts drafted.
[01/28/2026 00:30] 12:30 AM - Sub-agents completed overnight: Alygn-V2 (123 tests), OratorFlow fixes, DARE improvements, CineSynth UI, HeartCap UI polish, docs consolidated. AI-Align now feature-complete (landing, auth, OKRs, check-ins, initiatives, activity, analytics, settings, teams pages). Utilization at 13% - need to ramp up.
